name: test_e2e_with_logs[052_SQLI_BYPASS_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_003` |
| **Name** | Whitespace character WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'%20UNION%0ASELECT%09version(),NULL,NULL--`
